TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PrintSystemDesiredAccess extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies the different access rights (or levels of access) for printing objects.

span.span: Specifies the different access rights (or levels of access) for printing objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks I diritti di accesso che sono disponibili in ogni livello di accesso variano in base a quanto segue:The access rights that are available at each level of access vary according to the following: - Indica se il server di stampa è un computer o un dispositivo di server di stampa.Whether the print server is a computer or a print server appliance. - Il sistema operativo utilizzato.The operating system that is used. - Gli aggiornamenti di protezione installati.The security updates that are installed. - I criteri di sicurezza che sono supportati.The security policies that are supported. Per questo motivo, l'accesso a destra descrizioni nella sezione "Membri" sono tipiche dei diritti che corrisponderanno a ogni livello di accesso, ma i livelli di accesso elencati possono fornire più o meno diritti su sistemi specifici.For this reason, access right descriptions in the "Members" section are typical of the rights that will correspond to each access level, but the access levels listed may provide more or fewer rights on particular systems. Questi valori vengono utilizzati principalmente come parametri per e costruttori.These values are primarily used as parameters for and constructors. I costruttori genererà eccezioni se si utilizza un valore che è possibile applicare solo a un altro tipo di oggetto.The constructors will throw exceptions if you use a value that can apply only to another kind of object. Ad esempio, non passare AdministratePrinter a un costruttore.For example, do not pass AdministratePrinter to a constructor. ## Examples Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare questa enumerazione per installare una seconda stampante che differisce da quella esistente solo nel percorso, porta e lo stato condiviso proprietà relative.The following example shows how to use this enumeration to install a second printer that differs in its properties from an existing printer only in location, port, and shared status. [!code-csharp[ClonePrinter#ClonePrinter](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClonePrinter/CSharp/Program.cs#cloneprinter)] [!code-vb[ClonePrinter#ClonePrinter](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClonePrinter/visualbasic/program.vb#cloneprinter)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintSystemDesiredAccess AdministratePrinter = int32(983052)

summary.span: The right to perform all administrative tasks for the print queue, including the right to pause and resume any print job; and the right to delete all jobs from the queue.

span.span: The right to perform all administrative tasks for the print queue, including the right to pause and resume any print job; and the right to delete all jobs from the queue.

summary.span: This access level also includes all rights under .

span.span: This access level also includes all rights under .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintSystemDesiredAccess AdministrateServer = int32(983041)

summary.span: The right to perform all administrative tasks for the print server.

span.span: The right to perform all administrative tasks for the print server.

summary.span: This access level does *not* include rights for the print queues hosted by the server.

span.span: This access level does *not* include rights for the print queues hosted by the server.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintSystemDesiredAccess EnumerateServer = int32(131074)

summary.span: The right to list the queues on the print server.

span.span: The right to list the queues on the print server.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintSystemDesiredAccess None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintSystemDesiredAccess UsePrinter = int32(131080)

summary.span: The right to add print jobs to the queue and to delete and enumerate one's own jobs.

span.span: The right to add print jobs to the queue and to delete and enumerate one's own jobs.
